node.title: Shopping for Side Tables
node.alt: Side tables are accessories as important as “the bags and shoes of your outfit,” said Poonam Khanna, the founder of Unionworks studio in Brooklyn. (The Tray Side Table is about $149 at Hay.)
node.description: Small but essential, they personalize a room. And you need somewhere to put that cup of coffee.
node.content: ["Side tables are among the smallest pieces of furniture, but they make a big difference in the way a room looks.", "\u201cThey\u2019re like the bags and shoes of your outfit,\u201d said Poonam Khanna, an architect who founded the Brooklyn-based studio Unionworks. \u201cThey\u2019re accessories that are very important.\u201d", "Just as knockout shoes can enhance the look of simple clothing, interesting side tables can add visual appeal to an otherwise understated interior, whether you choose clean-lined ones made from beautiful materials or tables with sculptural forms or unexpected colors.", "Of course, it\u2019s not only about how they look. Side tables also make a room more inviting by adding flat surfaces beside sofas and chairs to hold lamps, books and drinks. Depending on your needs, they can be a simple pedestal or include drawers or shelves for storage.", "And those choices offer plenty of opportunity to personalize a room. \u201cYou could take the same space and just swap out the side tables,\u201d Ms. Khanna said, \u201cand it would change everything.\u201d", "Powder-coated steel table with storage cubby", "Sculptural ash-wood table", "Colored acrylic side table that can be used horizontally or vertically", "Oak table or stool with elliptical legs", "Powder-coated steel table with removable top"]
